Piotr Machalica (13 February 1955 – 14 December 2020) was a Polish actor. His career began in 1979. Machalica was born in Pszczyna, Poland. Machalica played Tadeusz in "Hero of the Year" (1987), Roman in ' (1988) and Roman in "A Short Film About Love" (1988).
Machalica died on 14 December 2020 in Warsaw from COVID-19 at the age of 65.
